DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study evaluate performance ease use Follow mode AutoLap system general gynecological laparoscopic procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Follow Me Mode AutoLap System - A Feasibility Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed date Informed Consent Form ( ICF ) . 2 . Patients 18 year 1 . Pregnancy 2 . Extensive adhesion preclude routine laparoscopic surgical approach . 3 . American Society Anesthesiologists ' ( ASA ) classification > 2
